verses.verse: And <WG2532> when<WG3753> they drew nigh<WG1448> unto<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414>, and<WG2532> came<WG2064> unto<WG4314> Bethphage<WG967>, unto<WG4314> the mount<WG3735> of Olives<WG1636>, then<WG5119> Jesus<WG2424> sent<WG649> two<WG1417> disciples<WG3101>,

saying <WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Go<WG4198> into<WG1519> the village<WG2968> that is over against<WG561> you<WG5216>, and<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> ye shall find<WG2147> an ass<WG3688> tied<WG1210>, and<WG2532> a colt<WG4454> with<WG3326> her<WG846>: loose<WG3089> them<WG71>, and bring them unto me<WG3427>.

And <WG2532> if<WG1437> any<WG5100> one say<WG2036> aught<WG5100> unto you<WG5213>, ye shall say<WG3754>, The Lord<WG2962> hath<WG2192> need<WG5532> of them<WG846>; and<WG1161> straightway<WG2112> he will send<WG649> them<WG846>.
Now <WG3650> this<WG5124> is come to pass<WG1096>, that<WG2443> it might be fulfilled<WG4137> which was spoken<WG4483> through<WG1223> the prophet<WG4396>, saying<WG3004>,

Tell ye<WG2036> the daughter<WG2364> of Zion<WG4622>, Behold<WG2400>, thy<WG4675> King<WG935> cometh<WG2064> unto thee<WG4671>, Meek<WG4239>, and<WG2532> riding<WG1910> upon<WG1909> an ass<WG3688>, And<WG2532> upon a colt<WG4454> the foal<WG5207> of an ass<WG5268>.
And <WG1161> the disciples<WG3101> went<WG4198>, and<WG2532> did<WG4160> even as<WG2531> Jesus<WG2424> appointed<WG4367> them<WG846>,
and brought<WG71> the ass<WG3688>, and<WG2532> the colt<WG4454>, and<WG2532> put<WG2007> on<WG1883> them<WG846> their<WG846> garments<WG2440>; and<WG2532> he sat<WG1940> thereon<WG846>.

And <WG1161> the<WG3793> most<WG4118> part of the multitude<WG3793> spread<WG4766> their<WG1438> garments<WG2440> in<WG1722> the way<WG1161>; and others<WG243> cut<WG2875> branches<WG2798> from<WG575> the trees<WG1186>, and<WG2532> spread<WG4766> them in<WG1722> the way<WG3598>.

And <WG1161> the multitudes<WG3793> that went before<WG4254> him<WG2532>, and that followed<WG190>, cried<WG2896>, saying<WG3004>, Hosanna<WG5614> to the son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>: Blessed<WG2127> is he that cometh<WG2064> in<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of the Lord<WG2962>; Hosanna<WG5614> in<WG1722> the highest<WG5310>.
And <WG2532> when<WG1525> he<WG846> was come<WG1525> into<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414>, all<WG3956> the city<WG4172> was stirred<WG4579>, saying<WG3004>, Who<WG5101> is<WG2076> this<WG3778>?
And <WG1161> the multitudes<WG3793> said<WG3004>, This<WG3778> is<WG2076> the prophet<WG4396>, Jesus<WG2424>, from<WG575> Nazareth<WG3478> of Galilee<WG1056>.

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the temple<WG2411> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> cast out<WG1544> all<WG3956> them that sold<WG4453> and<WG2532> bought<WG59> in<WG1722> the temple<WG2411>, and<WG2532> overthrew<WG2690> the tables<WG5132> of the money-changers<WG2855>, and<WG2532> the seats<WG2515> of them that sold<WG4453> the doves<WG4058>;

and <WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, It is written<WG1125>, My<WG3450> house<WG3624> shall be called<WG2564> a house<WG3624> of prayer<WG4335>: but<WG1161> ye<WG5210> make<WG4160> it<WG846> a den<WG4693> of robbers<WG3027>.
And <WG2532> the blind<WG5185> and<WG2532> the lame<WG5560> came<WG4334> to him<WG846> in<WG1722> the temple<WG2411>; and<WG2532> he healed<WG2323> them<WG846>.

But <WG1161> when<WG1492> the chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> the scribes<WG1122> saw<WG1492> the wonderful things<WG2297> that<WG3739> he did<WG4160>, and<WG2532> the children<WG3816> that were crying<WG2896> in<WG1722> the temple<WG2411> and<WG2532> saying<WG3004>, Hosanna<WG5614> to the son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>; they were moved with indignation<WG23>,

and <WG2532> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Hearest thou<WG191> what<WG5101> these<WG3778> are saying<WG3004>? And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Yea<WG3483>: did ye<WG314> never<WG3763> read<WG3754>, Out<WG1537> of the mouth<WG4750> of babes<WG3516> and<WG2532> sucklings<WG2337> thou has perfected<WG2675> praise<WG136>?
And <WG2532> he left<WG2641> them<WG846>, and went<WG1831> forth out<WG1854> of the city<WG4172> to<WG1519> Bethany<WG963>, and<WG2532> lodged<WG835> there<WG1563>.
Now <WG1161> in the morning<WG4405> as he returned<WG1877> to<WG1519> the city<WG4172>, he hungered<WG3983>.

And <WG2532> seeing<WG1492> a<WG1520> fig tree<WG4808> by<WG1909> the way<WG3598> side<WG2064>, he came to<WG1909> it<WG846>, and<WG2532> found<WG2147> nothing<WG3762> thereon<WG846>, but<WG1487> leaves<WG5444> only<WG3440>; and<WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto it<WG846>, Let<WG1096> there be<WG1096> no<WG3371> fruit<WG2590> from<WG1537> thee<WG4675> henceforward for<WG1519> ever<WG165>. And<WG2532> immediately<WG3916> the fig tree<WG4808> withered away<WG3583>.
And <WG2532> when<WG1492> the disciples<WG3101> saw<WG1492> it<WG2296>, they marvelled, saying<WG3004>, How<WG4459> did<WG3583> the fig tree<WG4808> immediately<WG3916> wither away<WG3583>?

And Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Verily<WG281> I say<WG2036> unto you<WG5213>, If<WG1437> ye have<WG2192> faith<WG4102>, and<WG2532> doubt<WG1252> not<WG3361>, ye shall<WG4160> not<WG3361> only<WG3440> do<WG4160> what<WG3588> is done to the fig tree<WG4808>, but<WG235> even if<WG2579> ye shall say<WG2036> unto<WG3735> this<WG5129> mountain<WG3735>, Be thou taken up<WG142> and<WG2532> cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the sea<WG2281>, it shall be done<WG1096>.
And <WG2532> all things<WG3956>, whatsoever<WG3745> ye<WG2532> shall ask<WG154> in<WG1722> prayer<WG4335>, believing<WG4100>, ye shall receive<WG2983>.

And <WG2532> when<WG2064> he<WG846> was come<WG2064> into<WG1519> the temple<WG2411>, the chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> the elders<WG4245> of the people<WG2992> came<WG4334> unto him<WG846> as he was teaching<WG1321>, and said<WG3004>, By<WG1722> what<WG4169> authority<WG1849> doest thou<WG4160> these things<WG5023>? and<WG2532> who<WG5101> gave<WG1325> thee<WG4671> this<WG3778> authority<WG1849>?

And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, I also<WG2504> will ask<WG2065> you<WG5209> one<WG1520> question<WG3056>, which<WG3739> if<WG1437> ye tell<WG2036> me<WG3427>, I likewise<WG2504> will tell<WG2046> you<WG5213> by<WG1722> what<WG4169> authority<WG1849> I do<WG4160> these things<WG5023>.

The baptism<WG908> of John<WG2491>, whence<WG4159> was it<WG2258>? from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772> or<WG2228> from<WG1537> men<WG444>? And<WG1161> they reasoned<WG1260> with<WG3844> themselves<WG1438>, saying<WG3004>, If<WG1437> we shall say<WG2036>, From<WG1537> heaven<WG3772>; he will say<WG2046> unto us<WG1223>, Why<WG5101> then<WG3767> did ye<WG4100> not<WG3756> believe<WG4100> him<WG846>?
But <WG1161> if<WG1437> we shall say<WG2036>, From<WG1537> men<WG444>; we fear<WG5399> the multitude<WG3793>; for<WG1063> all<WG3956> hold<WG2192> John<WG2491> as<WG5613> a prophet<WG4396>.

And <WG2532> they answered<WG611> Jesus<WG2424>, and said<WG2036>, We<WG1492> know not<WG3756>. He<WG846> also said<WG5346> unto them<WG846>, Neither<WG3761> tell<WG3004> I<WG1473> you<WG5213> by<WG1722> what<WG4169> authority<WG1849> I do<WG4160> these things<WG5023>.

But <WG1161> what<WG5101> think<WG1380> ye<WG5213>? A man<WG444> had<WG2192> two<WG1417> sons<WG5043>; and<WG2532> he came<WG4334> to the first<WG4413>, and said<WG2036>, Son<WG5043>, go<WG5217> work<WG2038> to-day<WG4594> in<WG1722> the<WG3450> vineyard<WG290>.
And he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, I will<WG2309> not<WG3756>: but<WG1161> afterward<WG5305> he repented<WG3338> himself<WG565>, and went.
And <WG2532> he came<WG4334> to the second<WG1208>, and said<WG2036> likewise<WG5615>. And<WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, I<WG1473> go<WG2962>, sir: and<WG2532> went<WG565> not<WG3756>.

Which <WG5101> of<WG1537> the two<WG1417> did<WG4160> the will<WG2307> of his father<WG3962>? They say<WG3004>, The first<WG4413>. Jesus<WG2424> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, that<WG3754> the publicans<WG5057> and<WG2532> the harlots<WG4204> go<WG4254> into<WG1519> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG4254> before<WG4254> you<WG5209>.

For <WG1063> John<WG2491> came<WG2064> unto<WG4314> you<WG5209> in<WG1722> the way<WG3598> of righteousness<WG1343>, and<WG2532> ye believed<WG4100> him<WG846> not<WG3756>; but<WG1161> the publicans<WG5057> and<WG2532> the harlots<WG4204> believed<WG4100> him<WG846>: and<WG1161> ye<WG5210>, when ye saw<WG1492> it<WG3756>, did not even repent<WG3338> yourselves afterward<WG5305>, that<WG3588> ye might believe<WG4100> him<WG846>.

Hear <WG191> another<WG243> parable<WG444>: There was<WG2258> a man<WG5100> that was a householder<WG3617>, who<WG3748> planted<WG5452> a vineyard<WG290>, and<WG2532> set a hedge<WG5418> about<WG4060> it<WG846>, and<WG2532> digged<WG3736> a winepress<WG3025> in<WG1722> it<WG846>, and<WG2532> built<WG3618> a tower<WG4444>, and<WG2532> let<WG1554> it<WG846> out<WG1554> to husbandmen<WG1092>, and<WG2532> went into another country<WG589>.

And <WG1161> when<WG3753> the season<WG2540> of the fruits<WG2590> drew near<WG1448>, he sent<WG649> his<WG846> servants<WG1401> to<WG4314> the husbandmen<WG1092>, to receive<WG2983> his<WG846> fruits<WG2590>.
And <WG2532> the husbandmen<WG1092> took<WG2983> his<WG846> servants<WG1401>, and beat<WG1194> one<WG3303>, and<WG1161> killed<WG615> another<WG3739>, and<WG1161> stoned<WG3036> another<WG3739>.
Again <WG3825>, he sent<WG649> other<WG243> servants<WG1401> more<WG4119> than the first<WG4413>: and<WG2532> they did<WG4160> unto them<WG846> in like manner<WG5615>.
But <WG1161> afterward he sent<WG649> unto<WG4314> them<WG846> his<WG846> son<WG5207>, saying<WG3004>, They will reverence<WG1788> my<WG3450> son<WG5207>.

But <WG1161> the husbandmen<WG1092>, when<WG1492> they saw<WG1492> the son<WG5207>, said<WG2036> among<WG1722> themselves<WG1438>, This<WG3778> is<WG2076> the heir<WG2818>; come<WG1205>, let us kill<WG615> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> take<WG2722> his<WG846> inheritance<WG2817>.
And <WG2532> they took<WG2983> him<WG846>, and cast<WG1544> him forth out<WG1854> of the vineyard<WG290>, and<WG2532> killed him<WG615>.
When <WG3752> therefore<WG3767> the lord<WG2962> of the vineyard<WG290> shall come<WG2064>, what<WG5101> will he do<WG4160> unto<WG1092> those<WG1565> husbandmen<WG1092>?

They say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, He will<WG622> miserably<WG2560> destroy<WG622> those<WG846> miserable men<WG2556>, and<WG2532> will let out<WG1554> the vineyard<WG290> unto<WG1092> other<WG243> husbandmen<WG1092>, who<WG3748> shall render<WG591> him<WG846> the fruits<WG2590> in<WG1722> their<WG846> seasons<WG2540>.

Jesus <WG2424> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Did ye<WG314> never<WG3763> read<WG314> in<WG1722> the scriptures<WG1124>, The stone<WG3037> which<WG3739> the builders<WG3618> rejected<WG593>, The same<WG3778> was<WG1096> made<WG1519> the head<WG2776> of the corner<WG1137>; This<WG3778> was<WG1096> from<WG3844> the Lord<WG2962>, And<WG2532> it is<WG1096> marvelous<WG2298> in<WG1722> our<WG2257> eyes<WG3788>?

Therefore <WG1223> say<WG5124> I<WG3004> unto you<WG3754>, The kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> shall be taken<WG142> away from<WG575> you<WG5216>, and<WG2532> shall be given<WG1325> to a nation<WG1484> bringing forth<WG4160> the fruits<WG2590> thereof<WG846>.

And <WG2532> he that falleth<WG4098> on<WG1909> this<WG5126> stone<WG3037> shall be broken<WG4917> to pieces<WG1161>: but on<WG1909> whomsoever<WG3739> it<WG302> shall fall<WG4098>, it will scatter<WG3039> him<WG846> as dust<WG3039>.

And <WG2532> when<WG191> the chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330> heard<WG191> his<WG846> parables<WG3850>, they perceived<WG1097> that<WG3754> he spake<WG3004> of<WG4012> them<WG846>.
And <WG2532> when they sought<WG2212> to lay hold on<WG2902> him<WG846>, they feared<WG5399> the multitudes<WG3793>, because<WG1894> they took<WG2192> him<WG846> for<WG5613> a prophet<WG4396>.
